channel.title: Blank Sources?
channel.description:
Hello fellow Moparians. I want to make a server. I have a source, but the way it is set together is not of my liking.
Every Source and client package I come across throws me some errors. When running the server, I am perfectly fine. The only problem is running the client. When I run the client it gives me heaps of errors that my novice RSPS experience can't understand.
Does anyone have any good sources with clients that have been known to work perfectly? Also I don't want all this crap with like custom items, retarded homes, really stupid looking donator symbols ect. I would like a really clean or close to clean source. Thanks...

item.title: Blank Sources?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Client: http://moparisthebest.com/downloads/srcAllDummiesRemoved.zip
Cache: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip

Server: Hyperion

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Sources?
item.dc:creator: @ByteSized ByteSized
item.description:
@ByteSized wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:453855”]I dearly hope when you refer to torva pkz you ware referring to torva pkz v3 or whatever it is. Torva pkz v1 and 2 are a poor poor attempt at fixing my anti leeches.

as for the errors, you keep saying you have errors however you have not posted these errors in server help and linked them in here. We cannot assist without media.[/quote]
Well to be honest, I use Rune-Server a lot, so when I am over there and you ask one of the simplest questions you get the same stupid answer: Learn java, or you suck at coding. So that server has left a bad taste in my mouth where I hardly ask for help anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Sources?

item.description:

I dearly hope when you refer to torva pkz you ware referring to torva pkz v3 or whatever it is. Torva pkz v1 and 2 are a poor poor attempt at fixing my anti leeches.

as for the errors, you keep saying you have errors however you have not posted these errors in server help and linked them in here. We cannot assist without media.

item.title: Blank Sources?
item.dc:creator: @ByteSized ByteSized
item.description:
@ByteSized wrote:

I’ve done some Java programming, but every freaking time I try to use a PI Source + Client I get errors and I’ve gone through atleast 6 clients. So it’s pretty frustrating. The only source that I have is Torva Pkz Source with I guess is off of Eclipse 639 source, and that source IMO is a train wreck for someone to code with.

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Sources?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:6, topic:453855”]If it were me, since I’m not advanced enough, I’d go for something that already has clipping, and droping/picking up. Those are probably the hardest I could think of.[/quote]not even close lol

npc/player updating is a huge hassle

Read full topic

item.title: Blank Sources?
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

If it were me, since I’m not advanced enough, I’d go for something that already has clipping, and droping/picking up. Those are probably the hardest I could think of.

item.description:
@ParadoxTM wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I released that blank source, I made it easier to find and edit details, also no errors if you have the right jdk.

item.title: Blank Sources?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

it really depends on what your experience in programming is at the current time. I would suggest using original project insanity if you are up for building from a simple base.

if you want something that is “already done” just go searching through the current download section there are several already done servers.

Read full topic
